name: lebanon-traffic-dataset
title: Lebanon Traffic Dataset
description: Road traffic data for Lebanon collected between 2014 and 2019.

licenses.title: Open Data Commons Open Database License 1.0

resources.name: velocities
resources.title: Velocities
resources.description: Location and velocity data of devices in automotive transport, confined to the country of Lebanon.

licenses.title: Open Data Commons Open Database License 1.0

fields.name: Date
fields.title: Date
fields.description: Date of when the data point was collected. Date values are reported in `Asia/Beirut` timezone.

fields.name: Time
fields.title: Time
fields.description: Time of when the data point was collected. Time values are reported in `Asia/Beirut` timezone.

fields.name: Coordinate (Lon, Lat)
fields.title: Coordinate
fields.description: Coordinate of where the data point was collected. Coordinates are represented as `(longitude,latitude)`, and NOT `(latitude,longitude)`.

fields.name: Course
fields.title: Course
fields.description: The direction in which the device was traveling when the data point was collected, measured in degrees starting at due north and continue clockwise around the compass. Thus, north is 0 degrees, east is 90 degrees, south is 180 degrees, and so on. Course values may not be available on all devices. A negative value indicates that the course information is invalid.

fields.name: Velocity
fields.title: Velocity
fields.description: The velocity the device was traveling at when the data point was collected, measured in meters/second NOT kilometers/hour.

fields.title: Street ID
fields.description: The unique identifier for the street using its OpenStreetMap (OSM) ID. Streets are map-matched from OSM with a simple linear algebra algorithm using the device's coordinate and course.

resources.name: streets
resources.title: Streets
resources.description: list of street features referenced in `velocities.csv` described in GeoJSON.

licenses.title: Open Data Commons Open Database License 1.0
